entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
